meanings.definition: A brand of petroleum jelly used as a skin protectant.
meanings.sent1: I always carry vaseline in my bag to keep my lips moisturized.
meanings.sent2: She applied a thin layer of vaseline on her dry elbows.
meanings.sent3: The vaseline worked like magic, making her skin soft and smooth.
meanings.sent4: His hands felt like vaseline-coated silk after using the lotion.
meanings.sent5: The vaseline created a protective barrier against the harsh wind.

meanings.definition: To apply petroleum jelly to something.
meanings.sent1: I will vaseline my heels before putting on socks.
meanings.sent2: She vaselined the hinges to stop the squeaking noise.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally vaselined the doorknob, making it slippery to touch.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic vaselined the gears to reduce friction.
meanings.sent5: Vaselining the bike chain helped it run smoothly.
